title: The Bone Snatcher
descriptions:
Unfortunately, I couldn't find information on a movie called "The Bone Snatcher" released in 2003. However, I found a New Zealand horror film with a similar title: "The Bone Snatcher" (2003) directed by Jason Stutter.

The plot follows a young boy named Tommy, who is kidnapped by a serial killer known as "The Bone Snatcher." Tommy's sister, a single mother named Mary, sets out to find him with the help of a local cop. As they delve deeper into the case, they uncover a dark secret behind the kidnappings.

The movie is a thriller with elements of horror and mystery. It explores themes of family, loss, and the consequences of the past. The film received mixed reviews but has its fans for its original storyline and suspenseful atmosphere.
